title: Consumer New Product Learning Course Utilizing Customized Interactive E-Learning (K-12)

context.additional_context: Developing consumer learning strategies applicable to language education for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain new product features using three or more exploration strategies with customized interactive e-learning tools.
Learners can design new product learning scenarios that account for adult learners' characteristics (experience, self-directedness).
Learners can develop assessment rubrics that provide learner-tailored feedback in online environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
